sentence.Network_en: Refugees run hither and thither in search of safety.
sentence.Network_cn: 难民们四处逃奔，寻求安全之所。

sentence.Network_en: He wandered hither and thither looking for a playmate.

list.abs: ...come full circle 白走回到原处毫无进展原地踏步come hither 勾引挑逗come home 回家返国归家返家返屋企对极了.

phrase.cizu_name: hither and thither (also hither and yon)

jx.jx_en_mean: In or to many places; here and there

lj.lj_ly: looked hither and thither for the ring; ran hither and yon.

phrase.cizu_name: hither and thither 或 hither and yon

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English hider, of Germanic origin; related to he and here

entry.def: Hither means to the place where you are.

example.ex: He has sent hither swarms of officers to harass our people.
example.tran: 他委派大批的官员到这里骚扰我们的人民。

entry.tran: 四处，到处（美国英语中有时用 hither and yon）
entry.def: Hither and thither means in many different directions or places, and in a disorganized way. In American English, the expression hither and yon is sometimes used.

example.ex: Refugees run hither and thither in search of safety.
example.tran: 难民们四处逃奔，寻求安全之所。

example.ex: ...the awful amount of time I spend moving things hither and yon every year!
example.tran: 我每年花在把东西搬来搬去上的大量时间

means.word_mean: 1. to this place (especially toward the speaker);

auth_sentence.content: Yesterday arrived to me hither your Majesties servants.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Yesterday arrived to me hither your Majesties servants.

auth_sentence.content: Fair Helen told me...Of this their purpose hither to this wood.

auth_sentence.content: Hermits retiring hither for Penance and Mortification.
auth_sentence.res_content: Hermits retiring hither for Penance and Mortification.
